summary: 该接口用于启动一个DBS备份计划。

schema.description: 备份计划ID，可通过调用[DescribeBackupPlanList](~~437215~~)接口获取该参数的值。
用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。

Success.description:
请求是否成功，返回值如下：
- **true**：请求成功
- **false**：请求失败

ErrMessage.example: The specified parameter %s value is not valid.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "HttpStatusCode": 200,
  "RequestId": "D13761C3-9971-5C02-B789-3F3CD159****",
  "ErrCode": "Param.NotFound",
  "Success": true,
  "ErrMessage": "The specified parameter %s value is not valid.  ",
  "CreatedFullBackupsetId": "1h7toien3****",
  "BackupPlanId": "dbsqdss5tm****"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<StartBackupPlanResponse>
    <RequestId>D13761C3-9971-5C02-B789-3F3CD159****</RequestId>
    <HttpStatusCode>200</HttpStatusCode>
    <BackupPlanId>dbsqdss5tmh***</BackupPlanId>
    <CreatedFullBackupsetId>1h7toien3****</CreatedFullBackupsetId>
    <Success>true</Success>
</StartBackupPlanResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 启动备份计划
